description: The bracer is a common choice to toughen up defenses and increase longevity.
attrs: Bonus +6 Strength +3 Agility +3 Intelligence +5% Magic resistance
info: For strength heroes, it grants 120 health, 0.6 health regen, 5.46% magic resistance, 0.48 armor, 3 attack speed, 0.15% movement speed, 36 mana, 0.15 mana regen, 0.21% spell damage and 6 attack damage.
For agility heroes, it grants 120 health, 0.6 health regen, 5.46% magic resistance, 0.48 armor, 3 attack speed, 0.15% movement speed, 36 mana, 0.15 mana regen, 0.21% spell damage and 3 attack damage.

For intelligence heroes, it grants 120 health, 0.6 health regen, 5.46% magic resistance, 0.48 armor, 3 attack speed, 0.15% movement speed, 36 mana, 0.15 mana regen, 0.21% spell damage and 3 attack damage.
